messages.message: I think there has been feedback on this before, but i’m really not a fan of the controls in the DocWidget hiding itself. It seems like there has been a change in UAT to make them harder to find as now you need to move near the top of the widget for the controls to show, before I think it was just hover anywhere over the document. Can we just make these show all the time like before?
Are you seeing this in the Build app?
I’m in converse in UAT at the moment. I have seen theres a 3 dot menu before to turn it off (but the default is hiding on) but theres no menu on the screen i’m currently on.
hm i thought the default was to show that bar in converse, @Aayush?
Yes, I’m still seeing the bar by default in Converse. Getting on a call with Lee shortly to understand the feedback better
Can't repro this in aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com (http://aihub-uat.internal.instabase.com), I'm seeing the bar always
@Lee also saw different behavior with prompts in chat-box — there may be something weird going on
Sorry i’m on prod, not UAT
Just checked on UAT and its always visible, seems like its been changed since the last release. Sorry for false alarm!
No worries! Appreciate all the feedback.
